3: (Stands on the royal guard's shoulders) Cannot... forgive...
Roland had the opportunity to do it because of you...
Babylonia... Ascendants...
You are all errors...
You all require correction from the Queen!
Nat! Open your eyes!
Is this what the Earth's rebirth looks like to you?
Do you think Earth will be saved if all humans submit to you?!
Lee instantly understands Lucia's intent and signals the others to encircle Nat.
Childish!
Humans are born wanting to be ruled, to be dominated...
That is the future of Earth!
Only as a tightened knot will Earth be saved!
He did it, he succeeded, and so will I!
The Golden Age is the proof!
Nat! The Golden Age is over!
Shut up, Construct!
I'm telling the truth! The Golden Age and everything then was destroyed by the Punishing Virus!
No matter what you tell yourself...
This is the world you have to face...
The Punishing Virus and destruction.
Your Golden Vortex is also destroyed by it.
Not... all of it...
(Notices the encirclement is completed) ...
You are still alive!
I... am the Queen...
I will not allow... will not allow...
